review: It was very easy to install and setup and works really well. I really have enjoyed my Fire TV.
author: KVes

review: Made my dumb TV into a smart TV! Great HD picture and easily sets up if you have an HDMI slot open. Now I don't have to listen to my wife gripe about not being able to watch Netflix and Amazon Video on the big den TV!
author: Hoghead

review: This product is amazing! Easy to install and use and I am buying another. I use the first one in a vacation home where I have Internet only, can still watch TV series and movies. Grandchildren can use it to play games.
author: Dorothy

review: It was ok, It had a grainie picture, so I returned it an now have a Roku 3 and it has a clearer picture.Both operate about the same.
author: bill

review: Great alternative to cable..Able to pick what I want to watch not what the cable company says I have to watch
author: pamela ripley

review: I really like it...I really don't like voice search...I would buy another, there's a lot more to like then dislike!

review: I do like this system.  Have had it for 6 months. There is so much available that I don't need cable any longer, but I do have NetFlix and Hulu subscriptions too.  Wish I could use it with a TV in another room without having to buy anything else.
